Uses of Package
eu.iv4xr.framework.extensions.ltl

Packages that use eu.iv4xr.framework.extensions.ltl
Package
Description
eu.iv4xr.framework.extensions.ltl
This package provides the following features: The classes LTL and BoundedLTL implementing Linear Temporal Logic formulas, and the bounded variation of them.
eu.iv4xr.framework.extensions.ltl.gameworldmodel
Provide a class, GameWorldModel, that can be used as a model of a "computer game".

    Description
    BasicModelChecker.MCStatistics

    Representing a witness execution.

    Representing a test suite produced by BasicModelChecker.testSuite(List, Function, int, boolean).
    BoundedLTL
    Bounded LTL is a variation of LTL.
    BoundedLTL.BLTLstate
    Internal state for tracking the formula-state.
    BoundedLTL.WitnessTrace
    Represent a 'trace' of an execution.
    Buchi
    Represent a Buchi automaton.
    Buchi.BuchiTransition
    Representing a transition in a Buchi automaton.
    IExplorableState
    Should be hashable and implements equals as well!
    IState
    An LTL formula is evaluated on a sequence of 'states' (to be more precise, a sequence of pairs (states,transitions)).
    ITargetModel
     
    ITransition
    An LTL formula is evaluated on a sequence of pairs (states,transitions).
    LTL
    Provides a representation LTL formulas and a DSL for constructing them.
    LTL.And
     
    LTL.LTLVerdictInfo
     
    LTL.Next
     
    LTL.Not
     
    LTL.Now
     
    LTL.Or
    For representing "phi || psi".
    LTL.Until
     
    LTL.WeakUntil
    Weak-until is not primitive in LTL-sense, but we add it as a separate class so that we can structurally recognize that a formula is a weak-until formula.
    SATVerdict
     
    SequencePredicate
    An abstract class representing a predicate over finite sequences, defining a minimum interface needed to evaluate such a predicate on a given sequence.
